name: Nice Haul
description:
Pull your end of the rope to your side of the screen in this tug of war platformer! Jump on launch pads, throw bombs, grab strength potions, and land on your opponent's head to win a chance to pull towards your side. You have 30 seconds, so let's haul!

Controls

  • Multiplayer mode: WASD for 1P, arrow keys for 2P
  • Single-player mode: WASD or ZQSD (for AZERTY keyboards)
  • Both modes: Space key to quack (no effect)

Created in just over a day for GMTK Game Jam 2021 (Joined Together). Most of the assets were created for this project, with the exception of the duck sprites, quacking, and music which were made for a previous game jam title (Nice Fall) and remaining sound effects (taken from free sites).
